thread.title: Best view of the city skyline from your immaculate room!
thread.title_full: Best view of the city skyline from your immaculate room! - Review of Courtyard by Marriott New York Manhattan/Central Park, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Elizabeth O
title: Best view of the city skyline from your immaculate room!
text:
The view from the rooms in this hotel is breathtaking! The staff are friendly and the hotel is clean and sophisticated! The breakfast area is open and airy and offers a welcome retreat from the hustle and bustle below! Just steps from many sights - this hotel is walking distance to Central Park, St. Patricks, and Times Square and it is across the street from The Ed Sullivan Theater...just to mention a few! The stylish rooms make your getaway a metropolitan trip to remember!
Room Tip: Ask for the highest floor possible you won't regret the priceless view of Times Square! See more room tips
